---
id: bGet_a_list_of_currency_assets
title: Get a list of currency assets
sidebar_label: Get a list of currency assets
description: /spot/v4/balances
---

## 接口

**GET** `/spot/v4/balances`

#### **Limit Flow Rules**

10/s/apikey

## 请求参数

| Name | Type | Mandatory | Default | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `currencies` | string | No |  | List of currencies, comma separated,eg: usdt,btc |

## 响应示例

```json
{
  "rc": 0,
  "mc": "string",
  "ma": [{}],
  "result": {
    "totalBtcAmount": 0,
    "assets": [
      {
        "currency": "string",
        "currencyId": 0,
        "frozenAmount": 0,
        "availableAmount": 0,
        "totalAmount": 0,
        "convertBtcAmount": 0
      }
    ]
  }
}
```
